description: This file is a CMake script defining functions for regex-based string processing, specifically designed to extract and modify substrings matching specific patterns within variables.

methods.name: string_take_regex
methods.description: Extracts a regex match at the beginning of a variable's value, shortens the variable in the process, and returns the match.

methods.name: string_take_regex_replace
methods.description: Performs regex matching similar to string_take_regex, but also replaces the matched portion with a specified string.
